title: Frostbite
description: Darkness hides a deadly secret.After a chemical plant explosion rocks Archer City, Sam and his friends discover they have gained superpowers. They are plunged into a treacherous world of danger and deceit. While some of the teens try to adjust to their newfound powers, Sam wishes to be rid of his. As the pressure mounts, some of the teens struggle to cope. Someone is lurking in the shadows with the power to manipulate darkness. The shadows creep through the school, threatening everything Sam loves.When life and safety are threatened, Sam risks it all to save his friends. Will Samâ€™s icy powers be enough, or will he lose himself to the very darkness he fights against?
author: R.L.  Harris
